Question: This person was named a Pro Bowl starter; in the Pro Bowl, he threw 3 touchdowns in a 38–27 victory and was named the game's MVP.
Hints: The Vols ended the season ranked third and this person came in sixth in Heisman Trophy voting.
It was this person's 5th game-winning drive this season.
For his efforts this person won AFC Offensive Player of the Week for the third time in 2008.
